Why can't i launch it?

The only problem is that it does not always launch on its own. The workaround is to go to "Startup and session", then to "Application Autostart" and click on "+add".
At "Name", enter "Plank", at "Description", enter Dock, at "Command", enter : /usr/bin/plank, then save and it should work.

description: Couldn't even run it. I had the dock but it was too small for my liking.

Read the full description! This package installs Ubuntu Budgie settings! It is not just for Plank Preferences! It totally changed my boot up screen. If you want the Plank Preferences dialog box, just run "plank --preferences" from either the Run dialog box (Alt+F2) or from a terminal window. Do NOT install this package!
summary: Incorrectly named app!! Do NOT install!

description: It doesn't show launch button to launch it and customise the dock and I opened it using "plank --preferences" command in terminal

This app is an addition to plank. ("sudo apt install plank") To open it, you need to hold down CTRL and right click at the bottom of plank. Click preferences, and voila! I've been using linux for 2 years now and have no idea how this fools so many people.

- A 12 year old
summary: Great app! Let me clear up the confusion!

description: Run terminal on you ubuntu type (plank --preferences) press enter

Either launch from CLI or software store (discover, etc) to configure Plank. Would be nice to have more control over styling ie: border-radius, drop-shadow, padding, gutter size, etc. but this will let you apply basic style and change positioning.
this helps me customize plank to my liking. Thank you for this software :D

我以为是那个美化桌面Dock的Plank。安装后会把系统启动和关机画面的Ubuntu图案替换成灰色背景的像日本动画火影忍者中写轮眼一样的图案，与Ubuntu的色调很不搭，这都没关系，问题是把这个软件移除后，那个写轮眼图案仍然存在，就一流氓软件！

這只是plank的設定，只安裝這個是打不開Dock的，我還要額外用指令安裝才能正常使用Dock

但以Dock來說，安裝好以後要使用的話，這絕對是很好的Dock
